ing: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna in water, drained
1 (6 ounce) package crumbled garlic and herb feta cheese
3 hearts of romaine lettuce, torn into pieces
des: "This super easy salad is a refreshing blend of fresh herbs, tuna, and greens.  Substitute diced chicken for the tuna  if you like.  It's a great summer meal."
ins: In a large serving bowl, toss together the tuna, feta cheese, lettuce, cucumber and green onion. In a smaller bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, parsley, mint leaves, salt and pepper. Pour over salad and toss gently. Serve immediately.
